'(
wordrule

((ruleid aorta-word-rule) 
  (concept ":AORTA:") 
  (words ("aorta" "aortic")))
    
((ruleid lung-word-rule)
 (concept ":LUNG:")
 (words ("lung" "lungs" "lung area" "lung areas" "lung field" "lung fields")))
 
((ruleid lobe-word-rule)
 (concept ":LOBE:")
 (words ("lobe" "lobes" "lobular")))
 
((ruleid base-word-rule)
 (concept ":BASE:")
 (words ("base" "bases" "basilar" "bibasilar" "by basilar")))
 
((ruleid hemithorax-word-rule)
 (concept (":HEMITHORAX:"))
 (words ("hemithorax")))

((ruleid "local-lung-area-rule-0") 
  (concept ":LOCAL-LUNG-AREA:") 
  (words 
    (":SINGLE-LUNG:" ":LUNG-LOBE:")))

((ruleid "localized-lung-rule-0") 
  (concept ":LUNG-AREA:") 
  (words 
    (":GENERAL-LUNG-AREA:" ":LOCAL-LUNG-AREA:")))
  
((ruleid single-lung-rule) 
  (words 
    (":LEFT-LUNG:" ":RIGHT-LUNG:")) 
  (concept ":SINGLE-LUNG:"))

((ruleid lung-area-rule) 
  (words 
    (":LOCAL-LUNG-AREA:" ":GENERAL-LUNG-AREA:" ":LUNG:")) 
  (concept ":LUNG-AREA:"))

((ruleid lung-lobe-rule) 
  (words 
    (":LEFT-UPPER-LOBE:" ":LEFT-LOWER-LOBE:" ":RIGHT-UPPER-LOBE:" ":RIGHT-MIDDLE-LOBE:" ":RIGHT-LOWER-LOBE:" ":MID-REGION-LEFT-LUNG:" ":UPPER-LOBE:" ":LOWER-LOBE:")) 
  (concept ":LUNG-LOBE:"))
  
((ruleid superior-segment-lobe-rule-0) 
  (concept ?1) 
  (words 
    ("superior segment") (":LUNG-LOBE:")))

((ruleid general-lung-area-rule) 
  (words 
    (":BILATERAL-LUNG:" ":BILATERAL-LOWER-LOBES:" ":BILATERAL-UPPER-LOBES:" 
    	":LOWER-LUNG-REGIONS:")) 
  (concept ":GENERAL-LUNG-AREA:"))
  
((ruleid upper-lobe-rule) 
  (words 
    (":BILATERAL-UPPER-LOBES:" ":UPPER-LOBE:" ":RIGHT-UPPER-LOBE:" ":LEFT-UPPER-LOBE:")) 
  (concept ":UPPER-LOBE:"))
  
((ruleid upper-lobe-word-rule)
 (concept ":UPPER-LOBE:")
 (words (":UPPER:") (":LOBE:" ":LUNG:")))
  
((ruleid lower-lobe-rule) 
  (words 
    (":BILATERAL-LOWER-LOBES:" ":LOWER-LOBES:" ":RIGHT-LOWER-LOBE:" ":LEFT-LOWER-LOBE:")) 
  (concept ":LOWER-LOBE:"))
  
((ruleid interpleural-space-rule) 
  (concept ":INTERPLEURAL-SPACE:")
  (words (":RIGHT-INTERPLEURAL-SPACE:" ":LEFT-INTERPLEURAL-SPACE:" 
  			":INTERPLEURAL-SPACE-NS:")))
  
;; interstitial regions
((ruleid interstitial-word-rule)
 (concept ":INTERSTITIAL:")
 (words ("interstitial")))
 
((ruleid "bronchialwall-0") 
  (concept ":BRONCHIAL-WALL:") 
  (words 
    ("bronchial" "peribronchial" "bronchial wall")))

((ruleid "onyx-16592-0") 
  (concept ":BRONCHIAL-WALL:") 
  (words 
    (":MIDDLE:") 
    (":BRONCHIAL-WALL:")))
    
((ruleid "cardiopulmonary-0") 
  (concept ":CARDIOPULMONARY:") 
  (words 
    ("cardiopulmonary")))
    
((ruleid "abdomen-0") 
  (concept ":ABDOMEN:") 
  (words 
    ("abdomen" "abdominal")))

;; Right lung
((ruleid right-lung-1) 
  (words 
    (":LUNG:") (":RIGHT:")) 
  (concept ":RIGHT-LUNG:"))
  
((ruleid "onyx-17231-0") 
  (concept ":RIGHT-LUNG:") 
  (words 
    (":PULMONARY:") 
    ("right sided")))
  
((ruleidXXX right-lung-2) 
  (words (":RIGHT:")) 
  (concept ":RIGHT-LUNG:"))
  
((ruleidXXX left-lung-2) 
  (words (":LEFT:")) 
  (concept ":LEFT-LUNG:"))

((ruleid "rightlung-2") 
  (words 
    (":MIDDLE:" "midlung" "mid lung") (":RIGHT:")) 
  (concept ":RIGHT-MIDDLE-LOBE:"))

;; RIGHT UPPER LOBE
((ruleid "rightlung-3") 
  (words 
    (":LUNG:" ":LOBE:") (":RIGHT:") (":UPPER:")) 
  (concept ":RIGHT-UPPER-LOBE:"))
  
  ;; Right upper lobe

((ruleid "rightupperlobe-1") 
  (words 
    (":LOBE:" ":LUNG:") (":RIGHT:") ("apex")) 
  (concept ":RIGHT-UPPER-LOBE:"))

((ruleid "rightupperlobe-3") 
  (words 
    (":RIGHT:") (":UPPER:")) 
  (concept ":RIGHT-UPPER-LOBE:"))
  
:: RIGHT MIDDLE LOBE

((ruleid "rightmiddlelobe-4") 
  (words 
    (":LOBE:" ":LUNG:") (":RIGHT:") (":MIDDLE:")) 
  (concept ":RIGHT-MIDDLE-LOBE:"))

((ruleid "rightmiddlelobe-5") 
  (words 
    (":RIGHT:") (":MIDDLE:")) 
  (concept ":RIGHT-MIDDLE-LOBE:"))

;; RIGHT LOWER LOBE

  (concept ":RIGHT-LOWER-LOBE:") 
  (words 
    (":LOBE:" ":LUNG:") 
    (":RIGHT:") 
    (":LOWER:")))

  (concept ":RIGHT-LOWER-LOBE:") 
  (words 
    (":RIGHT:") 
    (":BASE:" ":LOWER:")))

  (concept ?1) 
  (words 
    ("superior segment") 
    (":LOBE:" ":LUNG:")))

  (concept ":RIGHT-LOWER-LOBE:") 
  (words 
    (":LUNG:") 
    (":RIGHT:") 
    (":BASE:")))

  (concept ":RIGHT-LOWER-LOBE:") 
  (words 
    (":RIGHT:") 
    (":BASE:")))

  (words 
    (":POSTERIOR:") 
    (":RIGHT:") 
    (":BASE:")))

  (concept ":RIGHT-LOWER-LOBE:") 
  (words 
    (":POSTERIOR:") 
    (":MIDDLE:") 
    (":RIGHT:") 
    (":BASE:")))

 (concept ?1)
 (words 
    (":POSTERIOR:") (":LUNG-LOBE:") (":BASE:")))

  (words (":LEFT:") (":LUNG:")) 
  (concept ":LEFT-LUNG:"))

  (words 
    (":LOBE:" ":LUNG:" "lingula") (":LEFT:") (":UPPER:")) 
  (concept ":LEFT-UPPER-LOBE:"))

    (":LOBE:")

    (":UPPER:")))

  (words 
    (":LEFT:") (":LOWER:")) 
  (concept ":LEFT-LOWER-LOBE:"))

  (words 
    ("medial" ":MIDDLE:" ":LOWER:") (":LEFT:") (":BASE:" ":LOBE:" ":LUNG:")) 
  (concept ":LEFT-LOWER-LOBE:"))

((ruleid "leftlowerlobe-2") 
  (words 
    (":LEFT:") (":BASE:" ":LOBE:" ":LUNG:")) 
  (concept ":LEFT-LOWER-LOBE:"))
      
((ruleid "leftlowerlobe-5") 
  (words 
    (":LUNG:" ":LOBE:") (":LEFT:") (":LOWER:" ":BASE:")) 
  (concept ":LEFT-LOWER-LOBE:"))

((ruleid "leftlowerlobe-7") 
  (concept ":LEFT-LOWER-LOBE:") 
  (words 
    (":LEFT:") 
    (":BASE:")))

  (concept ":LEFT-LOWER-LOBE:") 
  (words 
    (":PULMONARY:") 
    (":LEFT:")))

  (concept ":LEFT-LOWER-LOBE:") 
  (words 
    (":POSTERIOR:") 
    (":LOBE:") 
    (":LEFT:") 
    (":LOWER:")))

  (concept ":LEFT-LOWER-LOBE:") 
  (words 
    (":LUNG:") 
    (":LEFT:") 
    (":LOWER:")))

    (":LEFT:")))

  (concept ":LEFT-LOWER-LOBE:") 
  (words 
    (":LATERAL:") 
    (":LOBE:") 
    (":LEFT:") 
    (":LOWER:")))

    (":LEFT:")

 (words 
    (":POSTERIOR:" ":LATERAL:" "aspect of" "superior segment" ":BASE:" ":PERIHILAR:")

    (":INTERPLEURAL-SPACE:"))

((ruleid "lung-word-rule") 
  (words 
    (":LUNG:" "lungs")) 
  (concept ":LUNG:"))

  (concept ":CHEST:") 
  (words ("chest")))

 (concept ":LOBE:")
 (words ("lobe" "lobes")))

 (concept ":PULMONARY:")
 (words ("pulmonary")))

((ruleid "local-positional-modifier-word-rule") 
  (concept ":LOCAL-POSITIONAL-MODIFIER:")
  (words (":POSTERIOR:" ":ANTERIOR:" ":RIGHT:" ":LEFT:"
  			":MIDDLE:" ":UPPER:" ":LOWER:")))
  			
((ruleid "general-positional-modifier-word-rule") 
  (concept ":GENERAL-POSITIONAL-MODIFIER:")
  (words (":BILATERAL:" ":LATERAL:")))
  	
((ruleid "compound-positional-modifier-word-rule") 
  (concept ?0)
  (type ?0)
  (words (":POSITIONAL-MODIFIER:") (":POSITIONAL-MODIFIER:")))

((ruleid "bilateral-word-rule") 
  (concept ":BILATERAL:")
  (words ("bilateral" "bilaterally" "both")))
  
((ruleid "left-word-rule") 
  (concept ":LEFT:")
  (words ("left" "left sided" "left-sided" "left side" "left-side")))
  
((ruleid "right-word-rule") 
  (concept ":RIGHT:")
  (words ("right" "right sided" "right-sided" "right side" "right-side")))
  
((ruleid "upper-word-rule") 
  (concept ":UPPER:")
  (words ("upper")))

((ruleid "middle-word-rule") 
  (concept ":MIDDLE:")
  (words ("mid" "middle" "medial" "central")))
  
((ruleid "lower-word-rule") 
  (concept ":LOWER:")
  (words ("lower")))
  
((ruleid "posterior-word-rule") 
  (concept ":POSTERIOR:")
  (words ("posterior" "posteriorly" "back")))
  
((ruleid "anterior-word-rule") 
  (concept ":ANTERIOR:")
  (words ("anterior")))

((ruleid "onyx-16751-0") 
  (concept ":HILUM:") 
  (words 
    (":LYMPH-NODE:") 
    (":BILATERAL:")))

  (words

  (concept ":BILATERAL-HILUM:"))

 (concept ":STRUCTURE:")
 (words ("structure" "structures")))

((ruleid either-hilum-is-hilum-rule)
 (concept ":HILUM:")
 (words (":RIGHT-HILUM:" ":LEFT-HILUM:" ":BILATERAL-HILUM:")))

    (":DIAPHRAGM:")))
    
((ruleid "left-right-diaphragm-is-diaphragm-rule") 
  (concept ":DIAPHRAGM:") 
  (words 
    (":RIGHT-DIAPHRAGM:" ":LEFT-DIAPHRAGM:")))
